title: The Wedding Bride
description: Stella’s ex-boyfriend Tony shows up and makes her question whether her fiancé Jed Mosely is really the one.
starring: Chris Kataan, Malin Akerman, Jason Lewis
altHero: Jason Lewis as Tony and Malin Akerman as Stella, faces close about to kiss
alt1: Chris Kataan as Jed Mosely, an obnoxious man with his feet up on his desk in red cowboy boots
alt2: Jed plays arcade games as Stella waits
alt3: Tony runs down the street in his karate gi
alt4: Stella, in her wedding dress at the altar, turns and looks surprised but happy
